amendment.description: To prohibit the United States Customs and Border Protection from preventing an individual not in the business of importing a prescription drug from importing an FDA-approved prescription drug.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4548 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 32. Record Vote Number: 191.

action.text: Amendment SA 4548 proposed by Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S7295-7305; text: CR S7295) To prohibit the United States Customs and Border Protection from preventing an individual not in the business of importing a prescription drug from importing an FDA-approved prescription drug.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4548 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 32. Record Vote Number: 191.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4548 proposed by Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4548 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 32. Record Vote Number: 191.
